channel.title: Pattern Matching on learn ▷ play ▷ write

item.title: Day 1 - Tabula Rasa
item.description: I did enough explorations the past few days and it’s time I emptied my cup and proceeded as a total newcomer to the language. Not a Python programmer trying to translate Python idioms into Elixir nor a Clojure programmer checking the language out, but starting with a clean slate and learning from zero. It is not an easy thing to do. Most of the time I would fight the urge to skip a line of the documentation with the assumption that “I already know”.
